name: Love Live! School Idol Paradise Vol. 3: Lily White Unit
name_original: Love Live! School Idol Paradise Vol. 3: Lily White Unit
description:
Love Live! School Idol Paradise Vol. 3: Lily White Unit is an arcade game developed by DINGO. It came out on 24-07-2014. It was published by Kadokawa Shoten. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Love Live! School Idol Paradise Vol. 3: Lily White Unit is available on PS Vita.
